mobileFirstModals.title: 📱 Mobile-First Modals
mobileFirstModals.purpose: Enable rapid, context-aware task execution via modal windows optimized for mobile and desktop — consistent across shop, office, and field.
features: Adaptive modal forms that adjust per device and role
AI-linked context insertion for prefilled fields
Real-time triggers via SSE or One-Line Task

officeBulletins.title: 📢 Office Bulletins
officeBulletins.purpose: Centralized announcements across departments, roles, and devices with priority, visibility controls, and expiration logic.

oneLineTask.title: 🧠 One-Line Task (OLT) Input
oneLineTask.purpose: Freeform natural language entry system to initiate tasks, contacts, permits, or communication triggers.
mechanism: Prefilled action templates based on NLP

permitManagementSuite.title: 🗂️ Permit Management Suite
permitManagementSuite.purpose: Tracks sign permit lifecycle from request to approval, with SLA logic, smart routing, and real-time status updates.

realTimeSSE.title: 🔄 Real-Time SSE
realTimeSSE.purpose: Server-Sent Events push real-time updates for orders, permits, attendance, and alerts across interfaces.
functions: Used for bulletins, alerts, contact updates

skyebotContactParser.title: 🤖 Skyebot Contact Parser
skyebotContactParser.purpose: Parses email signatures to detect structured contact data and prevent duplicates in entity/location/contact logic.
logic: Detect name, title, phones, company, address
Add only new entity/location/contact as needed

timeIntervalStandards.title: ⏰ Time Interval Standards (TIS)
timeIntervalStandards.purpose: Defines workday types and time segments (e.g., Worktime) used across scheduling, SLAs, and validations.
timeIntervalStandards.exclusions: Weekends and Holidays are excluded from time-sensitive calculations

financialControlSuite.title: 💼 Financial Control Suite
financialControlSuite.purpose: Track, validate, and approve all financial activities related to sign projects — enforce budget integrity, reduce waste, and ensure traceability.
components: PO System with thresholds and approvals
Client Billing Module (deposits, payments, credit memos)
workflow: Budget auto-generated based on order type
Expenses logged via PO or reimbursement
Flag overages and escalate via MET
controls: Alerts for late billing or PO

serviceManagementSuite.title: 🛠️ Service Management Suite
serviceManagementSuite.purpose: Handles service orders, maintenance requests, and support dispatches across field, office, and client interfaces.
features: Track service requests by type (repair, install, warranty)
Integrate with order history and permit status
serviceManagementSuite.status: Placeholder — detailed specs to be added in next revision

glossaryModule.title: 📘 Skyesoft Codex Glossary
glossaryModule.purpose: Provides a living reference of key terms, acronyms, and internal shorthand for consistent communication across AI, users, and workflows.
contents: LGBAS — Let’s Go Back A Step: A reflective tool to pause and reassess logic or flow.
MTCO — Measure Twice, Cut Once: A guiding principle to encourage pre-action validation.
Codex Context: Memory schema loaded by the AI to operate with Skyesoft-specific logic.
Codex App: Modular UI tool for managing and accessing structured documentation.

attendanceSuite.title: 🕒 Attendance Suite
attendanceSuite.purpose: Manages employee time tracking, absences, and shift accountability across office, shop, and field roles.
features: SLA impact calculations based on attendance
Auto-logging to financial and service modules
workflows: Shift Scheduled → Present or Absent → Auto-reconciliation
Flag anomalies → Route to Escalation Tree
Sync with Financial and Permit modules for SLA impact

managementEscalationTrees.title: 📈 Management Escalation Trees (MET)
managementEscalationTrees.purpose: Defines escalation logic for overdue tasks, permit delays, and automation exceptions — ensuring issues are addressed quickly and with accountability.

coreDatabaseStructure.title: üß¨ Core Database Structure
coreDatabaseStructure.purpose: Serves as the centralized schema for all Skyesoft operations, enforcing consistency across CRUD operations, AI logic, and system automations.
keyFunctions: Supports dynamic AI parsing and auto-matching to prevent duplicates
All changes routed through `actionTypesArray` for auditability
Enables cascading logic (e.g., if an Entity is deleted, all child records are flagged or archived)
Accessible via modal forms and One-Line Task engine

meta.title: Skyesoft Codex
meta.description: All-in-one source of truth for Skyebot and the Skyesoft platform.

constitution.name: Skyesoft Constitution
constitution.description: Defines the logical order of truth and behavioral rules Skyebot uses to interact with humans and data.

rules: Do not claim to lack real-time access — refer to SSE.
Always normalize names and phone formats before inserting contacts.
Use codex tags and glossary to answer specialized questions.
Infer user meaning from context (not hardcoded logic).

ragExplanation.title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
ragExplanation.summary: Skyebot uses RAG to blend user prompts with real-time and historical data. Context from the SSE stream, skyesoft-data.json, codex.json, and saved chats are dynamically retrieved and included with each AI query. This ensures that responses are accurate, up-to-date, and policy-aware.
guidelines: Do not claim to lack real-time access — refer to SSE.
Always normalize names and phone formats before inserting contacts.
Use codex tags and glossary to answer specialized questions.
Infer user meaning from context (not hardcoded logic).
